DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics single multiple ascend oral dos lecozotan SR healthy young elderly subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Safety Lecozotan SR Healthy Young Elderly Subjects
DOC.criteria: Young subject : Men age 18 45 year . Elderly subject : Men woman ≥ 65 year age . Body mass index range 18 30 kg/m2 body weight ≥ 50 kg . Healthy determine investigator . History neuropsychiatric disorder . History drug alcohol abuse .
